1.8.0.commit_description: Update against John The Ripper Git due to no official releases in several years... Build fixes.

1.7.2.commit_description: pts-core now handles K to numeric conversion so drop this faulty result-definition handling for certain cases of dynamic K.

1.7.1.commit_description: Fix for MD5 test run (JtR appending K to result, update parser) and Cygwin fix for Windows.

1.6.1.commit_description: Disable the configure native-tests to avoid some odd AVX-related build errors being reported on Linux systems

1.6.0.commit_description: Update against JTR 1.8.0-jumbo-1, prep initial Windows support.

1.5.1.commit_description: Support for building John The Ripper on non-x86 architectures. Change submitted by Michael Schloh.

1.5.0.commit_description: Update against upstream John The Ripper 1.8.0.

1.4.1.commit_description: Disable the cache share since the latest JTR upstream version seems to have issues with the parsing when using the PTS cache share.

1.4.0.commit_description: Update against John The Ripper 1.7.9-jumbo-7 upstream plus use openssl-development external dependency.

1.2.0.commit_description: Update against John The Ripper 1.7.9 upstream.
